text:
Milagrosa Tan (1957/1958 – 30 November 2019) was a Filipina politician. She was the Governor of Samar from 2001 through 2010 and again from June 2019 through her death. She was the first female governor of the province. She was a member of the House of Representatives of the Philippines.
Tan died at a hospital in Taguig from cardiac arrest on 30 November 2019, aged 61.

annotations.surface_form: House of Representatives of the Philippines
